content: *the socks are worked upwards from toe to cuffs the foot of the sock is worked in a striped pattern the heels are shaped using w&t short row the leg of the sock continues the patterning from foot the socks are finished with short ribbed cuffs * **size** small to fit 20 5 cm/8 foot circumference large to fit 23 5 cm/9 25 foot circumference the modeled sample is in size small with a length of 25 cm/10 from toe to heel **yarn** any fingering weight yarn in 9 colors approx 60m/66 yards each actual yardage will depend on finished foot and leg lengths which are easily adjustable **needles** 2 5mm/us#1 5 circular needle 80 cm/32 long for magic-loop or dpns **other** marker optional to mark bor tapestry needle for weaving in ends **gauge** 32 sts and 44 rnds = 10 cm/4 in st st worked in the round after wet blocking
